nodes.text: 5-Minute Star Wars Hero Stories is a hardcover title collecting five heroic stories from Disney–Lucasfilm Press's previously published 5-Minute Star Wars Stories. It was first available in September 2017 exclusively from retailer Kohl's, which donated 100 percent of the book's net profits to its Kohl's Cares charitable initiative. A companion title, 5-Minute Star Wars Villain Stories, was also available.
